title: Measuring and Analyzing Attitudes Toward Data Science Education: A Workshop on Scale Utilization for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis and Experience with Data Visualization Tools
context.additional_context: Cultivation of diagnostic and improvement strategy development skills regarding attitudes in data science education for preservice and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can measure learner attitudes across three sub-factors (cognitive, affective, behavioral) using the Data Science Education Attitude Scale (DSEAS)
Learners can diagnose educational effectiveness based on survey-based assessment results and design customized instructional strategies
Learners can derive program improvement points by conducting pre-post comparative analyses of attitude changes in large learner groups
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
